name: detector
description:
Created for bitjam by Abel Neto.

Instructions:

- Use the Handheld Metal Detector to locate scrap metal.

- The closer you are to it, the faster the device will flash.

- Once you extract the metal, the device will automatically recalibrate and determine the distance to the next extraction point.

- Repeat until instructed to do otherwise. Remember, your location is continuously being monitored by the device around your neck. Fugitives will be put to death.

Controls:

Mouse - Movement

M - Mute sound

C - Change color scheme

Esc - Quit

Developer notes:

A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights. To reduce the risk of photosensitive epileptic seizures:

  • Play in a well-lit room.
  • Use the alternative color scheme.
